channel.title: Tv on saahityaedams
channel.description: Recent content in Tv on saahityaedams

item.title: Favourite Comedy TV Shows
item.description:
Patriot

Depressed spy goes to Luxemborg undercover to bribe Iranians, messes it up and tries fixing it. He also has to be handle his BS undercover job.

Curb your Enthusiasm

Cynical Larry David is irritated by the world, sticks to his weird rules and offends people by accident.

Nathan for You

Nathan Fielder gives baffling and hilarious advice to small businesses.

James May: Our Man in Japan

English man tours Japan while engaging in british humour.

item.title: Favourite Drama TV Shows
item.description:
Bosch

Old school Los Angeles cop keeps solving a lot of cases with good old detective work.

Justified

US Marshal gets transfered back home to Kentucky. Emaculate old western movie vibes and a different side of American culture, ie Applachia.

Succession

Corporate family drama. Each of 3 incompetent kids want to run evil dad’s megacorp.
